about.title: Meet Antonio Silva
about.description:
Hi, I'm Antonio, I live in the state of Guanajuato in Mexico, I have an engineering degree in information technology from the Universidad de la Salle Bajío. In the last 8 years I have worked as a hardware and software support technician for my local government. I also have knowledge of the English language at level: B1.

I tell you that I have worked in teams for the development of pages for: e-commerce, information consultation website, etc. Using technologies like: Javascript, HTML, CSS, React, Redux, NodeJS, PostgreSQL, Git, Github.

Contact me to understand your needs and thus be able to help you.

projects.title: My projects
projects.project1Description: Focused on the people who perform sewing services and sell these items, My seam offers simplicity and clean design, this store prioritizes the user experience, making it easy for customers login with Auth0 and buy with Mercado pago.
projects.project2Description: Focused on the people who loves do excersice, this website offers simplicity and clean design, prioritizes the user experience with responsive design, join us to fit easily and completely your body, do you accept the challenge?
projects.project3Description: Focused on the people who loves pokemon, You can consult, modify, delete and create pokemon, which are consumed through an external API and, in turn, are stored in a database. Made by a lover of this wonderful world.
projects.project4Description: Focused on the people who loves movies, offers simplicity and clean design for the user experience, see any movie in any place.
